Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement Dist. -- 7.92 Mills Renewal - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Vernon, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a tax of seven and ninety-two hundredths (7.92) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $1,168,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 3 -- 7.90 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 3
(Library Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Vernon, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a seven and ninety hundredths (7.90) mills tax on all of the property subject to taxation within said Parish (an estimated $1,151,820 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, with the proceeds thereof, to be used for providing funds for improvement, operation and maintenance of the Vernon Parish Public Library System?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 3 -- 5.94 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 3
(Parish Courthouse and Annex Buildings Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Vernon, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a five and ninety-four hundredths (5.94) mills tax on all of the property subject to taxation within said Parish (an estimated $866,052 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of maintaining and improving the Vernon Parish Courthouse and Courthouse Annex Buildings?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 3 of 3 -- 5.84 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 3 of 3
(Parish Road and Bridges Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Vernon, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a five and eighty-four hundredths (5.84) mills tax on all of the property subject to taxation within said Parish (an estimated $619,040 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), the City of Leesville excepted, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of maintaining and constructing Parish roads and bridges within Vernon Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: S. Vernon Parish Waterworks Dist. No. 1 -- 10.1 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
South Vernon Parish Waterworks District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall South Vernon Parish Waterworks District No. 1 of Vernon Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of ten and one tenth (10.1) mills (an estimated $85,850 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the waterworks system of the District?
